q: `` My fear would be you don't have a guy like Eric Schmidt who keeps the trains running on time,'' said one former Google employee, who declined to be named for fear of reprisal. I'm having a hard time imagining( Larry Page ) going from the role I've seen him in, to going to a CEO role, he added.`` He can't come in and lay on the couch as he used to do and sort of interject here and there. Someone's got to lead the meetings.'' We welcome comments

Messrs. Eric Schmidt , Larry Page and Sergey Brin sought to play down any personality differences on Thursday. In an interview, Mr. Eric Schmidt said there had been no friction between the three that led to the change, and that they have been running particularly well in the last six or nine months because of this shared goal in efficiency. He added:`` We actually agree on, I think, everything.'' The shake-up changes the face of one of the world's biggest tech companies and comes as a new generation of founder-CEOs has
